action_item: Reports - Ensure all demographic fields are completed for accurate reporting.
notes: Fields include sexual orientation, client identity, birth sex, country of origin, ethnicity, race, language, and homeless status.

action_item: Requirements - Document the need for a different sliding fee scale based on grant requirements.
notes: The sliding fee scale should accommodate patients below the federal poverty level.

action_item: Requirements - Send eligibility forms to the team for review.
notes: Forms should include proof of address, proof of income, and ID for clients.

action_item: Client Portal - Investigate customization options for patient intake forms in the client portal.
notes: Check if additional questions can be triggered based on the program.

action_item: Data Migration - Explore the possibility of integrating client eligibility data into the new EHR system.
notes: This will reduce manual entry and improve reporting capabilities.

action_item: Interface - Discuss the need for a system interface to streamline data uploads.
notes: Current process involves multiple uploads which is inefficient.

action_item: Reports - Ensure the new EHR can generate reports on mandatory fields required by the county.
notes: This includes ethnicity, race, gender, and other relevant data.

action_item: DrFirst/EPCS - Confirm language capabilities for the patient portal to accommodate non-English speaking clients.
notes: Ensure at least the basic languages are available at go-live.
